name: Comic Creator
description:
UPDATE 021622: Formerly called Dialog Balloons, changed name to Comic Creator with the addition of:

  • Autolayout comic page roughly the size of a standard comic.
  • Autolayout row and single panel to create your own pages.

There are a set of comic style dialog balloons.

  • Speech
  • Thought
  • Angry
  • Inverted
  • Drunk

Reminder to detach the components before you start trying to create your own versions.


UPDATE 02/10/22: Added instruction card to Components page components.


Comments and suggestions always welcome. Thanks for checking them out!
